bill_title: provide for an organ donor designation on fishing and hunting licenses.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to provide for an organ donor designation on fishing and hunting licenses. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: 34-26-21.2. Licenses--Fishing and hunting--Information regarding organ donation. The Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall provide each person applying for a fishing or hunting license an opportunity to review information about organ donation. The department may make this information available: (1) On the Department of Game, Fish and Parks website; (2) Through mailings; (3) On posters and brochures; (4) In manuals published after July 1, 2021; and (5) By any other means the department deems appropriate. Section 2. That a NEW SECTION be added: 34-26-52.2. Licenses--Fishing and hunting--Designation as organ donor. If requested by an applicant for a fishing or a hunting license, the Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall place on a license issued to the person a designation indicating that the license holder is an organ donor. The department shall create a computer record of organ donors designated in accordance with this section and shall forward the record to the Department of Public Safety for retention and maintenance in accordance with § 34-26-52.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
